Melton JACKSON, Jr., Appellant,
v.
The STATE of Florida, Appellee. No. 3D17-2233 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District. Opinion filed May 16, 2018 Melton Jackson, Jr., in proper person. Pamela Jo Bondi, Attorney General, for appellee. Before EMAS, SCALES and LUCK, JJ. PER CURIAM.

Affirmed.
